name: qsiprep-fw
label: QSIPREP: workflows for preprocessing and reconstructing q-space images
description: qsiprep builds workflows for preprocessing diffusion MRI such as Diffusion Spectrum Images (DSI), multi-shell HARDI, compressed sensing DSI (CS-DSI) and DTI.
author: Matthew Cieslak

eddy_config.description: JSON file with parameters for eddy

freesurfer_license.description: FreeSurfer license file, provided during registration with FreeSurfer. This file will by copied to the $FSHOME directory and used during execution of the Gear.

recon_spec.description: JSON file describing the steps that will occur after preprocessing.

t1w_anatomy.description: T1 weighted anatomical NIfTI file. When provided this file will be used in place of any T1w images found in the current session.

b0_motion_corr_to.description: align to the 'first' b0 volume or do an 'iterative' registration of all b0 image to their midpoint image [default=iterative].

b0_to_t1w_transform.description: Degrees of freedom when registering b0 to T1w images. 6 degrees (rotation and translation) are used by default.

b0_threshold.description: Maximum b value for a b=0 image

combine_all_dwis.description: combine dwis from across multiple runs for motion correction and reconstruction [default=true].

do_reconall.description: Run FreeSurfer on anatomical scans - will increase runtime [default=false]

dwi_denoise_window.description: window size in voxels for ``dwidenoise``. Must be odd. If 0, ``dwidenoise`` will not be run.

dwi_no_biascorr.description: skip b0-based dwi spatial bias correction

fmap_bspline.description: fit a B-Spline field using least-squares (experimental)

fmap_no_demean.description: do not remove median (within mask) from fieldmap [ default = false ]

force_spatial_normalization.description: ensures that spatial normalization is run, even if template is not specified in --output-space. Useful if you plan to warp atlases into subject space.

force_syn.description: EXPERIMENTAL/TEMPORARY: Use SyN correction in addition to fieldmap correction, if available. [ default = false ]

hmc_model.description: model used to generate target images for hmc. If 'eddy', FSL's eddy is used, if '3dSHORE', SHORELine will be used.

hmc_transform.description: transformation to be optimized during head motion correction.

ignore.description: Ignore selected aspects of the input dataset to disable corresponding parts of the workflow. Possible choices: fieldmaps [default='']

impute_slice_threshold.description: impute data in slices that are this many SDs from expected. If 0, no slices will be imputed (not implemented)

intermediate_files.description: Space separated list of FILES to retain from the intermediate work directory.

intermediate_folders.description: Space separated list of FOLDERS to retain from the intermediate work directory.

intramodal_template_iters.description: Number of iterations for building the intramodal (b=0) template

intramodal_template_transform.description: Transform used for building the intramodal (b=0) template

longitudinal.description: Treat dataset as longitudinal - may increase runtime [default=false]

output_resolution.description: the isotropic voxel size in mm the data will be resampled to after preprocessing. If set to a lower value than the original voxel size, your data will be upsampled.

output_space.description: Volume and surface spaces to resample functional series into. Possible choices (space separated list): T1w, template. T1w: subject anatomical volume. template: normalization target specified by –template.  [default='T1w']

no_b0_harmonization.description: skip re-scaling dwi scans to have matching b=0 intensities

save_intermediate_work.description: Zip and save working directory with intermediate files. [default=false]

save_partial_outputs.description: Zip and save output directory contents on an algorithm failure. [default=false]

skip_bids_validation.description: Don't check that the input data is BIDS-compliant. [default=false]

skull_strip_fixed_seed.description: do not use a random seed for skull-stripping - will ensure run-to-run replicability when used with –omp-nthreads 1 [ default = false ]

skull_strip_template.description: Possible choices: OASIS, NKI. select ANTs skull-stripping template (default: OASIS))

sloppy.description: Use low-quality tools for speed - TESTING ONLY

template.description: Volume template space (default: MNI152NLin2009cAsym). This is currently the only choice.

use_syn_sdc.description: EXPERIMENTAL: Use fieldmap-free distortion correction. [ default = false ]

write_local_bvecs.description: write a series of voxelwise bvecs [default=false].

use_all_sessions.description: Use all sessions in this project for this subject
